issue.title: [C++][Packaging][deb][RPM] Linux package builds are failed by "No space left on device" on GitHub Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8519](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8519). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
